com.prodp.apsim
Class APVideoRecorder

java.lang.Object
  java.util.TimerTask
      com.prodp.apsim.APVideoRecorder
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class APVideoRecorder
extends java.util.TimerTask

3D object/model video recorder, takes a snapshot of the scene, transforms it into obj format, and saves it every ms.

Constructor Summary

          Constructor; creates a video recorder from a destination file.
